scan_linter_check.name: CodeSanity - GlideRecord without new
scan_linter_check.resolution_details: To fix this, add the new keyword before "GlideRecord", "GlideRecordSecure" or "GlideAggregate" (or any other class you want to instantiate). The code should look like this: var grSomething = new GlideRecord('something');
scan_linter_check.short_description: When creating a GlideRecord object, make sure to use "new" keyword
